FuncDef:
The user-name minimum-length command configures the minimum length of a local user name.
The undo user-name minimum-length command restores the default setting.
By default, the minimum length of a local user name is not limited.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the minimum length of a local user name.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 253.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To prevent accounts from being stolen and configure a minimum length for a local user name, run the user-name minimum-length command.
Configuration Impact
After the user-name minimum-length command is run, the newly created local user names must comply with the command configuration. Otherwise, the user accounts cannot be created. The user-name minimum-length command does not apply to the existing users.
